Trade/Device Name(s): BIOFIRE SHIELD Control Kit for the BioFire Global Fever Panel
Regulation Name(s): Device to detect and identify selected microbial agents that cause acute febrile illness
Assayed quality control material for clinical microbiology assays
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BioFire Global Fever Panel and BIOFIRE SHIELD Control Kit, multiplexed nucleic acid assay for detection of acute febrile illness pathogens on BioFire FilmArray 2.0 and Torch systems
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative, multiplexed nucleic acid-based test to detect chikungunya virus, dengue virus, Leptospira spp., and Plasmodium spp. (including differentiation of P. falciparum and P. vivax/ovale) from EDTA whole blood of individuals with suspected acute febrile illness, used with BioFire FilmArray 2.0 and Torch Systems; control kit intended for assayed quality control with the panel
